title: sapta
author: sapta
content: Trade your way to the top with the Yield Pro Simulator trading competition for a chance to win up to 5,000 USDC!For a chance to win, all you have to do is trade with virtual funds on the Yield Pro Simulator app. The top three traders who generate the highest simulated profits before 31 July will be rewarded in USDC. Keep an eye on the competition by checking our bi-weekly leaderboard, which will be posted on our community channels throughout the contest.1st prize: 5,000 USDC2nd prize: 2,500 USDC3rd prize: 1,000 USDCEveryone*: 500 locked YLDYield Pro Simulator is a user-friendly learning tool that allows you to assess your market perspectives, devise investment approaches, and understand structured products via authentic simulations. We believe that trading knowledge should be accessible to all, and in light of this, we're initiating this competition. It doesn't matter if you're an experienced trader or just stepping into the world of structured products; this opportunity presents a platform to learn and possibly profit.Yield Pro Simulator campaign period: 25 May 2023 at 12:00 AM UTC - 31 July 2023 at 12:00 AM UTC. Follow these instruction to get started:1. Download Yield Pro Simulator Download Yield Pro Simulator on iOS or Android.2. Create an accountWe've designed the competition so that it’s fair and inclusive. Only accounts created on or after 25 May will qualify for the contest. If you're an existing user, don't worry! Simply create a new account to take part.3. Start tradingEvery new account will receive a simulated starting capital of 100,000 USDC. Use these virtual funds to trade on Yield Pro Simulator and maximize your simulated profits.4. *Claim 500 locked YLD with your feedbackWe count on your feedback to help us improve. Within 72 hours of your first trade, we’ll email you a feedback form. Be sure to complete it by 7 August to secure a guaranteed reward of 500 locked YLD, which will unlock on 31 December with a 12% APY.Join Yield App and Yield Pro Telegram GroupIf any Bitcointalk member manages to secure a spot on the bi-weekly leaderboard, we've got a special treat in store for them - a bonus of YLD tokens! It's our way of recognizing and rewarding their outstanding performance in the competition. So, give it your all and aim to make it to the top for a chance to earn those extra YLD tokens!Terms & condition:- The Yield Pro Simulator trading competition will commence on 25 May 2023, at 12:00 AM UTC, and conclude on 31 July 2023, at 12:00 AM UTC.- By completing the feedback form, all competition participants - even existing Yield Pro Simulator users - qualify for the 500 locked YLD reward.- To secure your 500 locked YLD reward, make sure you provide the email address of your verified Yield App account details in the feedback form. Your 500 locked YLD reward will be available for withdrawal from 31 December 2023 onwards, and will accrue a 12% APY.- Do note that any active trades on Yield Pro Simulator that mature after 31 July 2023 will not contribute to your simulated profits tally for the competition.- The Yield Pro Simulator trading competition is open to everyone. For existing Yield Pro Simulator users, please create a new account to participate.- KYC is mandatory to get the reward- I will delete any unnecessary replies on this thread. Questions and suggestions are always welcome.- I am an employee of https://www.yield.app/
